text:
Hanna Stanek-Lisowska (4 May 1938 – 14 December 2020) was a Polish actress. She was born in Poznań, Poland. She was known for her roles in "The Real End of the Great War", "Lokis" and "The Third Part of the Night".
Stankówna died on 14 December 2020 in Warsaw at the age of 82.

annotations.surface_form: The Real End of the Great War
The Third Part of the Night
